article.Heading: Budget 2016: The Verdict
article.Summary: The Verdict brings to you some of the most influential opinion makers on what they made of the Budget fineprint and what Budget 2016 can do to stimulate growth and position India as an investment destination.
article.Body:
The Verdict brings to you some of the most influential opinion makers on what they made of the Budget fineprint and what Budget 2016 can do to stimulate growth and position India as an investment destination.

Watch accompanying videos for more...
